SELECT id, username, nickname, gender, STATUS, email, phone_number, remark, sys_user_dept.dept_id, sys_user_post.post_id, sys_user_role.role_id, CASE sys_user_dept.default_dept WHEN '0' THEN sys_user_dept.dept_id ELSE '' END AS default_dept_id FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_user_dept ON sys_user.id = sys_user_dept.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_post ON sys_user.id = sys_user_post.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ON sys_user.id = sys_user_role.user_id WHERE sys_user.id = #{id}

SELECT sys_user.username, sys_user.nickname, sys_user.gender, sys_user.status, sys_user.phone_number, sys_user.email, sys_user.remark, sys_dept.id, sys_dept.code, sys_dept.name as deptName, sys_role.name as roleName FROM sys_user LEFT JOIN sys_user_dept ON sys_user_dept.user_id = sys_user.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept ON sys_dept.id = sys_user_dept.dept_id and sys_dept.del_flag = '0' and sys_dept.status = '0' LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ON sys_user.id = sys_user_role.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ON sys_role.id = sys_user_role.role_id and sys_role.del_flag = '0' and sys_role.status = '0' ${ew.customSqlSegment}
